mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dut_hst ( user_id, /* 사용자ID */ bas_dt, /* 기준일자 */ svce_form_cd, /* 근무형태코드 */ st_dt, /* 시작일자 */ st_tm, /* 시작시각 */ aaw_btn_clk_dtm, /* 출근버튼클릭일시 */ ed_dt, /* 종료일자 */ ed_tm, /* 종료시각 */ sbt_num, /* 차감숫자 */ svce_prjt_txt /* 근무프로젝트txt */ ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{basDt}, #{svceFormCd}, #{stDt}, #{stTm}, #{aawBtnClkDtm}, #{edDt}, #{edTm}, #{sbtNum}, #{svcePrjtTxt} )

INSERT INTO dut_hst ( user_id, /* 사용자ID */ bas_dt, /* 기준일자 */ svce_form_cd, /* 근무형태코드 */ st_dt, /* 시작일자 */ st_tm, /* 시작시각 */ ed_dt, /* 종료일자 */ ed_tm, /* 종료시각 */ sbt_num, /* 차감숫자 */ svce_prjt_txt, /* 근무프로젝트txt */ rsn_txt /* 사유 */ ) VALUES
( #{item.userId}, #{item.basDt}, #{item.svceFormCd}, #{item.stDt}, #{item.stTm}, #{item.edDt}, #{item.edTm}, #{item.sbtNum}, #{item.svcePrjtTxt}, #{item.rsnTxt} )
mapper.select: SELECT bas_dt /* 기준일자 */ FROM hldy_info WHERE bas_dt BETWEEN #{stDt} AND #{edDt} AND hldy_yn = 'N'

SELECT T01.seq_no, T02.tel_no, T02.user_nm, T02.dty_nm, T02.blg_nm, T01.bas_dt, T03.dtl_cnm AS svce_form_cd_nm, T01.rg_dtm, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hldy_info WHERE (bas_dt BETWEEN T01.st_dt AND T01.ed_dt) AND hldy_yn = 'N' ) AS prd, ( SELECT ( (SELECT asg_dys + ans_dys FROM vctn_asg WHERE bas_yy = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND user_id = T01.user_id) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(sbt_num), 0) FROM dut_hst WHERE sbt_num != 0 AND user_id = T01.user_id AND dcz_sts_cd = 'CONFIRM' ) ) FROM dual ) AS sbt_aft_vctn_dys, T01.st_dt, T01.st_tm, T01.ed_dt, T01.ed_tm, T01.dcz_sts_cd, T04.dtl_cnm AS dcz_sts_cd_nm, T01.dcz_dtm, T05.user_nm AS dczmnNm FROM dut_hst T01 LEFT JOIN mem_bsc_info T02 ON T01.user_id = T02.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ds_cd, dtl_ds_cd, dtl_cd, dtl_ds_cd_nm, dtl_cnm FROM comn_cd WHERE ds_cd = 'DUTY' ) T03 ON T01.svce_form_cd = T03.dtl_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ds_cd, dtl_cd, dtl_cnm FROM comn_cd WHERE ds_cd = 'CONFIRM' ) T04 ON T01.dcz_sts_cd = T04.dtl_cd LEFT JOIN mem_bsc_info T05 ON T01.dczmn_id = T05.user_id WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo} ORDER BY T01.seq_no DESC

SELECT seq_no, /* 일련번호 */ bas_dt, /* 기준일자 */ svce_form_cd, /* 근무형태코드 */ st_dt, /* 시작일자 */ st_tm, /* 시작시각 */ ed_dt, /* 종료일자 */ ed_tm, /* 종료시각 */ svce_prjt_txt /* 근무프로젝트txt */ FROM dut_hst T01 /* 근태기록 */ LEFT JOIN comn_cd T02 /* 공통코드 */ ON T01.svce_form_cd = T02.dtl_cd WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND T02.dtl_ds_cd = 'ON_DUTY' ORDER BY T01.rg_dtm DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE dut_hst SET dcz_sts_cd = #{dczStsCd}, dczmn_id = #{dczmnId}, dcz_dtm = now() WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo}
UPDATE dut_hst SET dcz_sts_cd = #{dczStsCd}, dczmn_id = #{dczmnId}, dcz_dtm = now() WHERE seq_no = #{seqNo}
